column2: laudāte eum in firmāmentō virtūtis ejus. ^ Praise ye the Lord in his holy places
column3: praise ye him in the firmament of his power.

column2: laudāte eum secundum multitūdinem magnitūdinis ejus. ^ Praise ye him for his mighty acts
column3: praise ye him according to the multitude of his greatness.

column2: laudāte eum in psaltēriō, et citharā. ^ Praise him with the sound of trumpet
column3: praise him with psaltery and harp.

column1: 4 ^ Laudāte eum in timpanō, et chorō
column2: laudāte eum in chordīs, et organō. ^ Praise him with timbrel and choir
column3: praise him with strings and organs.

column1: 5 ^ Laudāte eum in cimbalīs bene sonantibus
column2: laudāte eum in cimbalīs jūbilātiōnis. ^ Praise him on high sounding cymbals
column3: praise him on cymbals of joy.

column1: 6 ^ Omnis spīritus laudet Dominum. Allēlūia. ^ Let every spirit praise the Lord. Alleluia.
